focused.text: You're in the zone! This is what success looks like.
Locked in. Beautiful. Keep this momentum going.
Deep work mode activated. You're building something amazing.

distracted.text: Bro, stop doom-scrolling and get back to building!
This isn't bringing you closer to your goals. Redirect that energy.
Your future self is counting on what you do right now.

neutral.text: Handle this quickly and get back to deep work.
Necessary tasks done efficiently = more time for what matters.
Time-box this activity and return to your priorities.
